context: Do you like the movie Donnie Darko?
Donnie Darko stars Seth Rogan and is a hilarious thriller movie.
What else has Seth Rogan been in?
Seth Rogen starred in Superbad as well as Pineapple Express. Pineapple Express also stars Bill Hader.
Wasn't James Franco in that? I really like him.
resp: Yes. James Franco was in the PIneapple Express. It was also produced by Judd Apatow.
